creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: left: 自摺　昭和三年作　富士拾景　船津 {jizuri, Shōwa sannen saku, Fuji jukkei, Funatsu} | bottom, in pencil: Fujiyama from Funatsu | Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LRC, red artist's seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on silk
portfolio: Ten Views of Fuji (Fuji jukkei 富士十景)
title: Funatsu
